elements.name: Add to Cart Experience for product in Home page

steps.name: User is on Greenkart Landing page
User searches with text "Cauliflower"
extracts actual name of search product
User selects and adds the product to cart from search results
User validates the product in the cart

name: Search and Place orders for Products

steps.name: the user is on the "https://demo.testfire.net/" website
clicks on the Login button

elements.name: User should be able to select and navigate to respective Account history screen in the banking website

steps.name: the user enters a valid jsmith and demo1234
the user selects account no 800003 from the drop down and clicks on Go
the user should be navigate to the Account history screen for 800003 selected
the user is on the "https://demo.testfire.net/" website
clicks on the Login button

elements.name: Search Expereince for product search in both Home and Offers page

extracts actual name of search product
